title: nIngAdenranai
sahitya:
nIngAdenranai nizhaladu toDarvadai gAngEyar nI kAngilaiyO


anupallavi

  pOngAlantanai pozhudellAm ninaindumE EngAninriDa evviDamEginum


caraNam    jyOtiyE unran tuNai aDiyaDaind-inda shUzh nizhal maraindiDa sukham peralAm enrE 
AdiyE vanduLEn AdarippAi ayyA anjalenraruL sheyyum Arumukha vElavA
